TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CompilationMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定義常數，指定 ASP.NET 應該要如何編譯 .aspx 頁面和 .ascx 控制項。

span.span: Defines constants that specify how ASP.NET should compile .aspx pages and .ascx controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉的值表示網頁或控制項是否應該在執行階段編譯。The enumeration values indicate whether a page or control should be compiled at run time. 指定無編譯模式時，預設值是永遠。When no compilation mode is specified, the default value is Always. 設定頁面，即可永遠不會編譯使用永不屬性以提高效能 disqualifying 編譯處理程序中指定的頁面。Setting a page to never compile using the Never attribute will increase performance by disqualifying the specified page in the compilation process. 若要定義頁面特定屬性來指定.aspx、.ascx 或.master 檔案不應該在頁面層級進行編譯，您可以使用類似下面的指示詞：To define a page-specific attribute that specifies an .aspx, .ascx or .master file should not be compiled at the page level, you can use a directive like the following: `<%@ page compilationMode="never" %>` 編譯模式也可以指定在組態檔中。The compilation mode can also be specified in configuration files. 組態區段物件識別頁面特定的組態設定。The configuration section object identifies page-specific configuration settings. 可以在機器、 網站、 應用程式和子目錄的層級的組態檔中宣告的組態項目。The configuration section element can be declared at the machine, site, application, and subdirectory levels of the configuration files. 如果設定為永不和某個頁面包含需要編譯的指令碼區塊或程式碼建構，ASP.NET 會傳回錯誤並不會執行頁面。If the is set to Never and a page contains a script block or code construct that requires compilation, ASP.NET will return with an error and the page will not run. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用頁面指示詞，以表示網頁應該永遠不會進行編譯。The following code example demonstrates how to use the page directive to indicate that a page should never be compiled. [!code-aspx-csharp[CompilationMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CompilationMode/CS/compilationmode_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CompilationMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CompilationMode/VB/compilationmode_vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.CompilationMode Always = int32(2)

summary.span: 此頁面應該始終都要編譯。

span.span: The page should always be compiled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.CompilationMode Auto = int32(0)

summary.span: 可能的話，ASP.NET 將不會編譯此頁面。

span.span: ASP.NET will not compile the page, if possible.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.CompilationMode Never = int32(1)

summary.span: 此頁面或控制項應該永遠都不要動態編譯。

span.span: The page or control should never be dynamically compiled.
